note: Based on representative sample of 48 repos, with projections for full dataset. Issues extrapolated based on star count distribution.

issues: Different project - Rust implementation of SSV protocol, not Solana Anchor framework
programsWithIssues.note: False positive - name collision with solana-foundation/anchor

issues: Potential spam/scam repository - copy trading bots often used for scams
programsWithIssues.note: Multiple similar repos from same user suggest pattern

issueTypes.description: Repositories that have been archived by their owners
issueTypes.impact: Code is read-only, no updates possible

issueTypes.description: Repositories that return 404 - likely deleted or renamed
issueTypes.impact: Links are broken, code is inaccessible

issueTypes.description: Repositories that have been made private
issueTypes.impact: Code is no longer publicly accessible

issueTypes.description: Repositories where the code viewer cannot find supported file types
causes: Repos with code in non-standard directories

issueTypes.description: ZIP download URLs return 404 - usually due to non-standard default branch names
issueTypes.fix: Use GitHub API to detect actual default branch

issueTypes.description: Repositories with names that match Solana keywords but are unrelated
issueTypes.example: sigp/anchor is an SSV protocol implementation, not Solana's Anchor framework

recommendations.action: Remove from database or update with new URL
recommendations.howToFix: Search for renamed repos by owner history, or remove if truly deleted

recommendations.action: Remove from database - no longer publicly accessible
Update scanner to handle additional directory patterns and file types
Update default branch detection to use GitHub API instead of assuming 'main'
recommendations.codeChange: Use data.default_branch from GitHub API response

recommendations.action: Add 'archived' flag to database schema and display in UI
recommendations.uiSuggestion: Show archive badge, deprioritize in search results

recommendations.action: Implement heuristic filtering for low-quality repositories
heuristics: Repos with excessive keyword stuffing in descriptions
Multiple similar repos from same user (copy-paste)
Repos with names matching popular keywords but containing unrelated content
Very low star counts with suspicious descriptions

codeViewerAnalysis.howItWorks: The code viewer searches for files with specific extensions in priority directories
commonReasonsForNoCodeFound: Code is in non-standard directory structure
Main code is in submodules not fetched
Repository is actually empty or just a README

commonIssues: Repository uses non-standard branch name like 'develop' or 'trunk'
Repository has no branches (empty or newly created)
zipDownloadAnalysis.fix: Query GitHub API for actual default branch: GET /repos/{owner}/{repo} -> data.default_branch

dataQualityMetrics.recommendation: Database is in good health. Prioritize fixing the 15 high-severity broken links.
